jobDescription: Help clients drive alignment with their business; improve organizational and human resource performance to deliver value to business. Advise clients through critical and complex issues, while allowing oneself to develop personally and professionally.  This involves working on People oriented Business transformation programs from ideation to implementation, managing program tasks, participating in problem-solving, conducting research, creating proposals, assisting in business development, and contributing to practice building.
requiredSkills: C/C++ or any procedural or Object oriented Language
